title: Psychoactive
creator_credit: William E. Cohen and Paul Steinbroner
brief_description: Surveys the effects of psychoactive drugs on the nine systems of the human body, and demonstrates how each system functions and how a drug intended for one body system throws the others into disequilibrium. Based on research and practical experience at the San Francisco Drug Detoxification and Rehabilitation Project.
